@HARUno I believe that there IS a societal price to pay for the immersion of millions of kids worldwide in ever increasingly realistic depictions of slaughter. What that price is going to be probably hasn't manifested yet. But it's getting there.
But is your example congruent with what I stated? No. Because murder, for most, is a much more egregious offense than having sex with someone underage. Hell, "underage" is different depending on your country, even what state you live in. But murder is murder everywhere.
